title: Japan Blossoms Explorer Tour
inclusions_evidence: Economy class airfares from Auckland to Tokyo, Tokyo to Hiroshima then Tokyo back to Auckland on Air NZ & All Nippon Airways (ANA) including all airfare and airport taxes.
Shinkansen Bullet Train from Kobe to Kyoto.
Quality hotel accommodation throughout, including 1 night at a traditional Ryokan on historic Miyajima Island.
All dinners included and many in local restaurants.
Sightseeing tours in Tokyo, Hiroshima, Kobe, Kyoto, Kanazawa, Takayama and Lake Kawaguchi.

flights.assumed_route: Auckland to Tokyo, Tokyo to Hiroshima, Hiroshima to Tokyo

other.notes: Estimated costs for additional meals and transportation.

reasoning: The travel agency deal includes comprehensive services, flights, and accommodations, making it significantly cheaper than DIY options.
additional_notes: The deal offers a well-rounded experience with guided tours and meals included.
